title: Cowboys vs’ Detroit Lions Referee Quits After Coming Into $500,000
subtitle: Rumor: NFL referee Pete Morelli quit after being paid $500,000 for his officiating at 2014 Cowboys-Lions playoff game.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: NFL referee Pete Morelli quit after being paid $500,000 for his officiating at 2014 Cowboys-Lions playoff game.
